sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT api_code1 AS ouropcode, api_code7 AS utilityopcode, api_code8 AS payone
FROM t_op_api_rel
WHERE op_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.op_id}} */

SELECT t_op_api_rel.api_code1 AS ouropcode, t_op_api_rel.api_code7 AS utilityopcode, t_op_api_rel.api_code9 AS payone, m_api_fwd.service_id, m_api_fwd.api_id, m_api.api_name, m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password
FROM t_op_api_rel
LEFT JOIN m_api_forward AS m_api_fwd ON (m_api_fwd.operator_id = t_op_api_rel.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_api AS m_api ON (m_api.id = m_api_fwd.api_id)
WHERE t_op_api_rel.op_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.op_id}} */ AND m_api.status = 1
